name: Guangzhou Solitaire
description:
Clone of the Solitaire game in Shenzhen I/O.

  • The goal is to remove all the cards from the board.
  • The three slots in the top left corner can be used to temporarily store a card.
  • If 4 aces of the same colour are exposed and a "temporary slot" is available, all four of those aces can be permanently moved to that slot.
  • Cards can be stacked in descending order and with alternating colours. Cards can not be placed on aces.
  • Cards can be permanently placed in the top right "permanent slots" in ascending order by colour.
